alert.note: Alert for Mitchell; Osborne (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 13 at 8:57PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Mitchell and southeastern Osborne Counties through 930 PM CDT... At 856 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Victor to near Hunter to 10 miles north of Luray. Movement was east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Rural areas of southeastern Osborne and southwestern Mitchell Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
